price: Na wanapo waona husema: Hakika hawa ndio khasa walio potea.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
footnotes: Na wakiwaona Waumini husema: Ama hakika hawa wamepotea kweli kwa kumuamini Muhammad.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awhum qālū inna hāulāi laḍāllūna
